introduction.p: This is the base class of all control templates for different list controls.

prop.name: BackgroundTemplate
prop.p: This property defines the control template for a item background. If it is empty, the default control template for the ListItemBackground theme will be used.
An item background is a selectable button. The button is selected when the list item is selected.
If the DisplayItemBackground property of the list control is false, BackgroundTemplate will be ignored, and item templates must handle the visual effect of item selections.
